name: CHEMANDOS (Demo)
description:
Let’s Chemi-GO!!

CHEMANDOS is an edutainment styled run n’ gun action platformer where chemistry is your power!

Join chemist microbots Antom and Microl (in single or local co-op) forced in an adventure of subatomic proportions to save Utopian City from an invasion of microscopic evildoers known as the Small n' Sinister!

Use the power of Chemistry to combine elements from the periodic table to form various kinds of chemicals that set bad guys ablaze, frozen, or asunder!

Literally experiment with dozens of combinations of chemical compounds to exploit enemy weaknesses and interact with the environment through chemical reactions!

Face massive (yet tiny) bosses responsible for the chaotic rule over Utopian City! They will test your reflexes and wit in bodacious bonding brawls!

Associations

Wob Wob Rob

Unreality

Lineout Studio
